item.title: Jeep teardown Part II the rear
item.description: Today I had planned to do the task of dropping the rear suspension, which should have been pretty easy compared to the front. Turned out, it was not destined to be that way. One day this week I am going to pick up a completely rebuil dana 30 axle geared 4.88:1, and also a guy is coming to buy my 3.5" lift springs. Next step will be to buy some 1.
